page.title: 08FRUIT FARMING.
page.content: We met a Mr.Walters,who has worked on for many years.As a boy he missed a lot of school when he acted as a {scarecrow} in the orchards from 4a.m. until evening.He later worked with {Hops},walking on stilts to string the poles and later to pick them in buckets.They were then taken to the {Oasthouse}to be dried for 8 Hours.They were then stuffed in bags called {Pokes} before being sent to the brewery.He also picked cherries from 60 rung ladders because they were very tall.Today trees are cultivated that are very small,{Dwarf Trees},to make picking easier.Many Cherry trees are being {grubbed out} because they are unprofitable.Many old varieties of fruit are vanishing,to be replaced by high yielding,disease resistant crops.
